item.title: Return of the... me?
item.description:
So here we are again.

After 20 years, you’d think I’d have gotten the hang of keeping a personal website current and up to date. Alas, times and priorities change.

Hopefully now that it’s easy to build with Hugo that will change and I can stick around for awhile and actually keep this up to date and post regularly.

We’ll see.
